name: Paraphernalia Gift Certificates!
description: Give the gift of Paraphernalia! These gift certificates are easy peasy to use - just click the button above, select your recipient, message and amount, and the recipient will receive a spiffy gift voucher for Paraphernalia, redeemable at any time!

name: Anatomica Red Heart Necklace
description:
A new twist on our absolute favourite – our Anatomica Heart Necklace. Is the previous incarnation too discreet for you? Try this one! Fantastic red, which will be sure to impress!

	Pendant is 2.2”/6.2cm wide, and 3.1”/8cm long. Comes with an 18” silver plated chain.

	All pendants are made of printed and cut acrylic, which is rigid, quite light, and slightly translucent.

name: Sleuth Camera Necklace
description:
Oh my, look at this! The Sleuth Collection is inspired by 40’s detective films and Lois Lane from old Superman comics – a mix of intrigue, investigation and intelligence!

	This a large necklace – very much real size – but my oh my is it wonderful! It has a fantastic three dimensional effect, but it’s as light as a feather, and comes with an 18” silver plated chain.

	All pendants are made of printed and cut acrylic, which is rigid, quite light, and slightly translucent.

name: Chroma Ete Necklace
description:
The Chroma collection is made with beautiful patterns from the 1920’s. A charming addition to any d√©colletage, it allows for a vibrant addition to any outfit.

	Printed on light acrylic and slightly curved to ensure comfort and perfect fit, it comes with an 14” silver plated chain, with an extender that can take it up to 18”. If you need it larger, just let me know!

name: Petit Nom Name Necklace
description:
Absolutely beautiful frame to frame your beautiful name! Carry your own name, your lover’s name, your favourite word, or anything you might desire near your heart!

	Please leave me a note when you purchase telling me what you’d like me to write on your lovely pendant. Remember, the larger the word, the smaller the letters will be!

	Perfect present for Birthdays, Christenings, and Christmas!

	Pendant measures 3.2 inches / 8.2 cm long, and 1.5 inches / 4 cm wide. Comes with an 18” silver plated chain.

	All pendants are made of printed and cut acrylic, which is rigid, quite light, and slightly translucent.
